fields.Name: Rami Kalish
fields.Notes: Founded Polaris Venture Capital (later Pitango) in 1993 as part of the Yozma government initiative. Prior to founding Pitango, held sales/marketing positions at IBM and senior executive roles at Orbotech. Built Pitango into Israel's largest VC fund with $3B+ under management, 300+ investments, 90+ exits.

fields.Name: Gigi Levy-Weiss
fields.Notes: NFX GP, prolific angel

fields.Name: Zvi Ziv
fields.Notes: Co-founder of Silver Castle. Former CEO of Bank Hapoalim - Israel's largest banking group ($75B+ under management). World Bank consultant. Banking industry veteran turned crypto. Company publicly traded on TASE.

fields.Name: Deddy Lavid
fields.Notes: CEO & Co-founder of CyVers. Serial ML entrepreneur with 11 patents in anomaly detection. Founded Presenso (acquired by SKF), then led SKF Israeli subsidiary.

fields.Name: Omer Goldberg
fields.Notes: Chaos Labs founder

fields.Name: Yaniv Tal
fields.Notes: The Graph co-founder - decentralized indexing protocol

fields.Name: Alon Shvartsman
fields.Notes: Co-Founder and CEO of Newhedge - Bitcoin analytics platform providing market-leading research and on-chain insights. Founded 2022. Quickly became leading Bitcoin intelligence terminal.

fields.Name: David Solomon

fields.Name: Ami Luttwak
fields.Notes: Adallom & Wiz co-founder. 8200 + Talpiot alumni. Microsoft $320M + Google $32B exits.

fields.Name: David Lachmish
fields.Notes: Ika co-founder - parallel MPC network

fields.Name: Ziv Keinan
fields.Notes: Founder and CEO of Simetria - Israel's first digital securities marketplace. Former founding member and COO of Ownera (backed by JP Morgan, US Bank). Backed by Tim Draper's Draper Goren Holm VC. Holds ISA no-action letter for digital securities trading.

fields.Name: Erez Ben-Kiki
fields.Notes: Co-founder and CEO of ChainPort (blockchain bridge). Also co-founded 2key. ChainPort is first bridge with 95% cold storage security, MPC cryptography. Flagship product of DcentraLab alongside TokensFarm and Hord.

fields.Name: Tal Be'ery
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Zengo. TAU MS EE, CISSP. 9x BlackHat speaker. Ex-Microsoft Sr Manager Security Research. Ex-Aorato VP Research (acq by MSFT). Ex-Imperva. Won Coinbase bug bounties.

fields.Name: Yaniv Azar
fields.Notes: Co-founder and CEO of nReach (Web3 B2B sales platform). Background in leadership roles at Israel Elite Intelligence Unit 8200. AI and data-driven solutions expert. Created platform achieving 5x response rates vs traditional methods.

fields.Name: Roberto Klein
fields.Notes: Co-founder of Backed Finance (tokenized stocks), Legal Lead. B.S. and M.S. from Tel Aviv University in Electrical Engineering. Previously at DAOstack handling legal and regulatory. Company HQ in Zug, Switzerland. Acquired by Kraken.

fields.Name: Dov Moran
fields.Notes: Israeli businessman, electrical engineer, inventor. Best known as inventor of USB flash drive (DiskOnKey). Founded M-Systems in 1989 - grew to $1B revenue, sold to SanDisk for $1.6B in 2006. Founded Modu (modular smartphone) in 2007 - raised $130M, shut down 2011. Patents sold to Google for $4.9M (became Project Ara). Serial entrepreneur and investor.

fields.Name: Dima Kogan
fields.Notes: Fordefi co-founder - institutional wallet, 8200 alumni

fields.Name: Michael Shaulov
fields.Notes: Fireblocks founder, $8B valuation

fields.Name: Ilan Schuster
fields.Notes: Tech industry background. Introduced Laurence Newman to Bitcoin which led to founding Coinmama.

fields.Name: Yonatan Roash
fields.Notes: Bits of Gold co-founder & Chairman. Founded 2013 with brother Yuval. 200K+ customers, Israel's largest crypto entity.

fields.Name: Roei Levav
fields.Notes: Co-founder of Efficient Frontier. Co-founded Tradomatics (traded 5-10% of TASE options, $5B+ annual). Angel/VC investor since 2006. Active Bitcoin community volunteer educating regulators. $10B+ monthly crypto volume.

fields.Name: Ruben Perez
fields.Notes: CTO & CPO Certhis. Self-taught full-stack dev since 2010. Blockchain ecosystem experience since 2016. 10+ years in technology.

fields.Name: Ami Luttwak
fields.Notes: Adallom + Wiz co-founder

fields.Name: Kfir Nissan
fields.Notes: Co-founder and CEO of Valid Network (Web3 intelligence). Based in Be'er Sheva with NY office. Company raised $8M from Ten Eleven Ventures and JVP. Platform provides real-time monitoring, forensics, and investigation for smart contracts and on-chain behaviors.

fields.Name: Shauli Rejwan
fields.Notes: Sponsors Web3 Dev Underground

fields.Name: Eran Ruso
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Crowdsense (shut down). Former tech leader at ICE (NYSE owner) and Super Derivatives. Led 70+ person tech dept at CET. Now at V-HOLA Labs. ML/NLP expert.

fields.Name: Tal Asa
fields.Notes: BSc Communication Systems Engineering Ben-Gurion U. 16+ years full-stack development. Former VP R&D, Applications Group Manager. Expertise: Software Design, System Architecture, Multithreading.

fields.Name: Yehonatan Cohen Scaly
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of dWallet Labs / Odsy / Ika Network. Vulnerability researcher - found 0-days in Linux kernel. Kernel exploitation, race conditions, UAF, heap shaping expert. Bar-Ilan University.

fields.Notes: CEO & Co-founder of Addressable. Talpiot program alum. 3x Israeli Defense Prize winner. Elite technical + leadership background.

fields.Name: Oren Yokev
fields.Notes: Co-founder and CTO of Chain Reaction (ZK proofs/privacy chips). Led technology unit of Israeli Prime Minister's office for 21+ years. Specialized in cybersecurity and R&D team management. Technion classmate of Alon Webman.

fields.Notes: Ika co-founder - parallel MPC network

fields.Name: Amos Meiri

fields.Name: Chemi Peres
fields.Notes: Son of former President Shimon Peres. Born July 17, 1958 in Tel Aviv. Joined Rami Kalish in 1996 to co-found Polaris Fund II (later Pitango). Built Pitango into Israel's largest and longest-standing VC with 14 funds, $3B+ under management.

fields.Name: Shahaf Bar-Geffen
fields.Notes: Founder and CEO of COTI Network (2017) - enterprise payments blockchain. Serial entrepreneur 15+ years. Previously sold Web3 media company to McCann Erickson (IPG) in 2016. Founded Positive Mobile (early smartphone advertising, acquired). Co-founded WEB3 digital marketing (2006, now in 15 countries). First beneficiary of Cardano's cFund.

fields.Name: Netanel Kabala

fields.Notes: Co-founder and Head of Engineering at Sodot (MPC infrastructure). Previously Co-Founder and CTO of Colu. Played key role in developing Colored Coins specification for Bitcoin. Part of founding team in July 2023.

fields.Name: Daniel Peled

fields.Name: Tom Teman

fields.Notes: CEO & Co-founder of Zengo (2M+ users, zero hacks). Founded TechCrunch France (acq AOL 2009). Co-founded ISAI (French VC), Appsfire (acq 2016). HEC Paris MBA. Regional BD at AOL-ICQ.

Transitioned from government service to crypto innovation. Founded Sodot July 2023 with sub-5ms MPC signing technology.

fields.Notes: Co-founder & VP Strategic Partnerships at Orbs. BSc summa cum laude Electrical Engineering, Technion. Previously co-founded Visualead (first Israeli company acquired by Alibaba). Tech installed on 600M+ devices in China. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/uriel-peled-61073b29

fields.Name: Ori Levi
fields.Notes: Founder and CEO of NFTrade - first cross-chain and blockchain-agnostic NFT platform. Aggregates all NFT marketplaces. Supports Ethereum, BSC, Avalanche, Polygon. Features P2P swaps, NFT farming. NFTD governance token.

fields.Name: David Ring
fields.Notes: eToro co-founder

fields.Name: Raz Niv
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Blockaid ($83M raised). IDF 8200 veteran. ISRAEL DEFENSE PRIZE winner. Ex-PM Office Cyber R&D Team Lead. Met Ido during military service. Team of 20+ 8200 alumni.

fields.Name: Eliran Ouzan
fields.Notes: Serial entrepreneur (20+ years in tech). CEO of CryptoHub and CoinScan charting platform. iAngels backed. Building crypto trading tools and analytics for traders.

fields.Name: Amram Adar
fields.Notes: Oobit co-founder - crypto payments app

fields.Name: Ben Sharon
fields.Notes: CEO & Co-founder of LumiShare - RWA tokenization platform for renewable energy. Mentor at Stanford Web3 & AI Research Lab. Technion educated. Background in cybersecurity and marketing. In crypto since 2016. Partnership with Sheikh Mohamed Bin Ahmed Al Nahyan's private office.

fields.Name: Guy Peer
fields.Notes: Software expert who served as VP of R&D at Unbound Security. Co-founded Unbound Security (2014) with Yehuda Lindell, Nigel Smart, and Avner Mor. Company acquired by Coinbase for ~$150M in 2022.

fields.Name: Udi Hakim
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Tweed. Former Cymotive/Volkswagen. Deep automotive security background.

fields.Name: Pavel Berengoltz
fields.Notes: Fireblocks co-founder & CTO

fields.Name: Dr. Yonatan Sompolinsky
fields.Notes: Hebrew University. Created KASPA, GHOST protocol (influenced Ethereum). Mentioned in ETH whitepaper.

fields.Name: Elad Mor
fields.Notes: CEO & Co-founder of MarketAcross. 10+ years Web3 PR. Also founded InboundJunction, Chainwire. 500 Startups mentor. Angel investor (accessiBe). 400+ crypto clients incl. Binance, Polygon, Solana.

fields.Name: Aharon Miller
fields.Notes: COO Oobit. Blockchain evangelist, fintech entrepreneur. In crypto since 2015. Founded ESP technology company. Worked with Adar at WaveTech before Oobit.

fields.Name: Dr. Asaf Nadler
fields.Notes: Chief Scientist & Co-founder of Addressable. IDF 8200 alum. PhD-level data science expertise.

fields.Name: Eilon Lotem
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Tres Finance. Previously CTO and co-founder of a cybersecurity company. Met Tal during military service.

fields.Name: Oliver Horr
fields.Notes: Director of Operations & Co-founder of Hats Finance. Building decentralized security audit marketplace.

fields.Name: Tomer Shlomo
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Addressable. Technion graduate. Building web3 analytics infrastructure.

fields.Name: Matan Field
fields.Notes: Co-founder & CEO at DAOStack (shut down 2022). PhD Theoretical Physics, Weizmann Institute (String Theory). Previously founded La'Zooz (decentralized ride-sharing), Backfeed. Now at Common. LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/matan-field-92a2b396

fields.Name: Yoni Goldberg
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Dynamic (acq by Fireblocks $90M). MIT graduate. IDF veteran. Serial entrepreneur. 15+ year partnership with Turbahn since MIT.

fields.Name: Nadav Zafrir
fields.Notes: Former 8200 Commander, Team8 founder, now Check Point CEO

fields.Name: Shay Zluf
fields.Notes: CTO & Co-founder of Hats Finance. Former La'Zooz. Pioneer in on-chain bug bounty infrastructure.

fields.Name: Eric Wall
fields.Notes: Taproot Wizards co-founder - Bitcoin Ordinals

fields.Name: Dov Moran
fields.Notes: M-Systems ($1.6B exit), Modu founder, Grove Ventures founder

fields.Name: Guy Zyskind
fields.Notes: FHEenix co-founder - previously Secret Network/Enigma

fields.Name: Itsik Levy
fields.Notes: Co-founder and CEO of Whitestream (blockchain analytics). Founded 2014. Specializes in AML, KYC, fraud detection, counterterrorism funding. Provides investigation services to governments and financial institutions. Identified Hamas fundraising on Coinbase.
